Name: Egg King
About the game: Join our discord: Gameplay While descending you will face various challenges that you will overcome by rolling, jumping and avoiding taking fall damage. Note: You can expect 1-2 hours of gameplay. Story You are a peasant that decides to take up the challenge of pursuing the tyrant king's lost crown. Your competitiveness and determination will shape you and your family's future, and the future of Eggland. Downhill Your journey begins at the castle and will continue through different lower landscapes. While descending you may take fall damage that can crack or even break your egg. Speed Run Keep track and improve the time of completion of each checkpoint and compare your best time with your current one. Atmosphere Each zone has unique art, music, and special platforms that set the feel of the game. Functionality The game is supported by a keyboard and controllers with haptic feedback.
